source.oracleReaderQuery:
WITH FirstQuery AS (
    SELECT 
        FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO,
        FLD_PSCH_Q_SEQ_NO,
        FLD_PSCH_Q_PRODN_ORD_NO,
        FLD_PSCH_TAG_ID_FROM,
        FLD_PSCH_PLAN_WRK_CTR
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO,
            FLD_PSCH_Q_SEQ_NO,
            FLD_PSCH_Q_PRODN_ORD_NO,
            FLD_PSCH_TAG_ID_FROM,
            FLD_PSCH_PLAN_WRK_CTR
        FROM scm_admin.cabsequencing
        MINUS
        SELECT 
            FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO,
            FLD_PSCH_Q_SEQ_NO,
            FLD_PSCH_Q_PRODN_ORD_NO,
            FLD_PSCH_TAG_ID_FROM,
            FLD_PSCH_PLAN_WRK_CTR
        FROM scm_admin.esb_cabsequencing        
    )
    where ROWNUM <=2
)
SELECT * FROM (
    SELECT				 				
        NVL(FSQ.FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO,
        NVL(FSQ.FLD_PSCH_Q_SEQ_NO, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_Q_SEQ_NO,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_Q_OPER_TYPE, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_OPER_TYPE,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_Q_START_TIME, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_START_TIME,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_Q_END_TIME, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_END_TIME,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_PLAN_PROCESS_TIME, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_PLAN_PROCESS_TIME,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_MSG_ID, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_MSG_ID,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_CUST_ID, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_CUST_ID,
        SUBSTR(REPLACE(FLD_PSCH_CUST_DESC,'''','"'),0,50) AS FLD_PSCH_CUST_DESC,
        SUBSTR(REPLACE(FLD_PSCH_SHIP_TO_DESC,'''','"'),0,50) AS FLD_PSCH_SHIP_TO_DESC,
        NVL(FSQ.FLD_PSCH_Q_PRODN_ORD_NO, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_PRODN_ORD_NO,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_PRODN_ORD_NO, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_PRODN_ORD_NO,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_SAL_ORD_NO, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_SAL_ORD_NO,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_ITEM_NO, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_ITEM_NO,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_MATL_NO, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_MATL_NO,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_PROD_GROUP, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_PROD_GROUP,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_SHAPE_CODE_ID, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_SHAPE_CODE_ID,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_SAL_FG_QTY, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_SAL_FG_QTY,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_SAL_FG_UOM, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_SAL_FG_UOM,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_PRODN_QTY_PCS, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_PRODN_QTY_PCS,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_PLAN_PRODN_DATE, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_PLAN_PRODN_DATE,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_PLAN_PRODN_SHIFT, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_PLAN_PRODN_SHIFT,
        SUBSTR(REPLACE(FLD_PSCH_RUN_NO,'''','"'),0,12) AS FLD_PSCH_RUN_NO,
        NVL(FSQ.FLD_PSCH_TAG_ID_FROM, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_TAG_ID_FROM,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_DEPNT_REQ_FLAG, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_DEPNT_REQ_FLAG,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_INDEPNT_ITEM, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_INDEPNT_ITEM,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_INDEPNT_MATL_NO, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_INDEPNT_MATL_NO,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_ENG_DWG_NO, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_ENG_DWG_NO,
        NVL(FSQ.FLD_PSCH_PLAN_WRK_CTR, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_PLAN_WRK_CTR,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_PLAN_SETUP_TIME, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_PLAN_SETUP_TIME,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_SEQ_NO, '0') AS FLD_PSCH_SEQ_NO,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_NXT_WRK_CTR, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_NXT_WRK_CTR,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_Q_ISRELEASE, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_ISRELEASE,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_Q_RELEASE_DATE, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_RELEASE_DATE,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_Q_CREATE_DATE, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_CREATE_DATE,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_Q_MODIFY_DATE, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_Q_MODIFY_DATE,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_RELEASE_CODE, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_RELEASE_CODE,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_PU_NR_OF_OPERATION, 0) AS FLD_PSCH_PU_NR_OF_OPERATION,
        CASE 
            WHEN FLD_PSCH_UOPQUANTITY < 0 THEN '1'
            ELSE NVL(TO_CHAR(FLD_PSCH_UOPQUANTITY), '0')
        END AS FLD_PSCH_UOPQUANTITY,
        NVL(FLD_PSCH_UOPQUANTITYUOM, ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_UOPQUANTITYUOM,
        ROWNUM AS rnum
    FROM scm_admin.cabsequencing FSQ 
    JOIN FirstQuery FQ ON 
        FSQ.FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO = FQ.FLD_PSCH_Q_PO_NO AND
        FSQ.FLD_PSCH_Q_SEQ_NO = FQ.FLD_PSCH_Q_SEQ_NO AND
        FSQ.FLD_PSCH_Q_PRODN_ORD_NO = FQ.FLD_PSCH_Q_PRODN_ORD_NO AND
        FSQ.FLD_PSCH_TAG_ID_FROM = FQ.FLD_PSCH_TAG_ID_FROM AND
        FSQ.FLD_PSCH_PLAN_WRK_CTR = FQ.FLD_PSCH_PLAN_WRK_CTR
);
